jobDescription: The Bulldog Solutions Marketing Data Analyst serves to advance Bulldog's operational goals to measure and continuously improve our performance, while simultaneously serving Bulldog's clients and client success teams as a trusted analytical resource. As such, the Marketing Data Analyst must be equally comfortable interacting internally, as well as acting in a consultative role with Bulldog clients. Moreover, the position will serve to bridge the gap between analytical efforts and the data management necessary to support them.
